contexts.context: It left them in fact no other <mark>matter</mark> for Deliberation than what might belong in good Faith...
...that Occupation, which devolves upon them not as <mark>matter</mark> of Option, but as a Duty under existing...
...can, a priori, be made the subject <mark>matter</mark> of an Alliance between the Great Powers of Europe...
...Nation and Nation can never properly be made a <mark>matter</mark> of written stipulation or be assumed as the Attribute...
